helio.materialiser

Class HelioUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • helio.materialiser.HelioUtils

  • public class HelioUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a set of methods that ease the code writing
    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

      • concatenate

        public static java.lang.String concatenate(java.lang.String... str)
        This method concatenates a set of strings efficiently in memory
        Parameters:
        str - a set of String values
        Returns:
        a unique String concatenating all the input string values provided

      • isValidURL

        public static boolean isValidURL(java.lang.String urlStr)
        This method checks whether a URL is correctly formed
        Parameters:
        urlStr - a set of String value containing the URL
        Returns:
        a boolean value that is true if the URL is correct, or false otherwise

      • createGraphIdentifier

        public static java.lang.String createGraphIdentifier(java.lang.String subject,
                                                     java.lang.String datasourceId)
        This method creates the a graph name for a subject taking into account its related DataSource id.

        The graph identifier created should be used to name a graph that contains all the triples related to the subject.

        Parameters:
        subject - an RDF subject, i.e., a valid URI
        datasourceId - the id of a DataSource
        Returns:
        a valid URI that identifies the graph where all the triples related to a subject should be stored

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.String readFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method reads the content of a file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file directory
        Returns:
        the content read from the file
